entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Winchester
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 11:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: NE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
